client_id.title: Xray Cloud Client Id
client_id.description: Xray API Key Client ID: See the docs for instructions on how to generate API Key: https://docs.getxray.app/display/XRAYCLOUD/Global+Settings%3A+API+Keys

client_secret.title: Xray Cloud Client Secret
client_secret.description: Xray API Key Client Secret: See the docs for instructions on how to generate API Key: https://docs.getxray.app/display/XRAYCLOUD/Global+Settings%3A+API+Keys

projects.title: Project Keys or IDs
projects.description: List of Jira project Keys or IDs to sync.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff.

api_timeout.title: API Request Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the Xray API. 0 means no timeout.

api_page_limit.title: API Page Size
api_page_limit.description: The number of records to request from the API per call. Maximum is 100. https://xray.cloud.getxray.app/doc/graphql/#node-limit

api_max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
api_max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the Xray API.
